website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, durable trimmer that is easier to wield and modify as needed.
pros: Starts quickly and provides enough power to mow down weeds with ease
cons: A bit on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Bad weedeater
customer_reviews.text: It will not stay running after it gets warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weed eater
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 6 months now and it cranks every time. Runs great and is perfect for what I need. It was rated #2 out of the top 10 weed eaters of 2016 and there is a reason why. It's a great trimmer/weed eater and hasn't failed me all summer long Starting my 2nd summer with this trimmer and cranked it up no issues and still working as it should. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: If you like your shins getting chewed up every time you trim, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It rotates counter clockwise - unlike every other trimmer I've ever owned. Call me crazy, but I like my shins. This is a completely left handed trimmer and no where on the package or writings does it say so. If you're right handed, you'll have to learn how to be left handed. Buy shin guards while you're at it...
customer_reviews.author: Anon Omus

customer_reviews.title: many problems after 30 times used in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: regular trimmer head looks good, but.... When I try replace it to another contemporary heads started problems. I 2 times ordered new heads from Amazon and both times was returned, coz new heads fit 90% trimmers in America, but not rioby. Finally I ordered third time assembly head and pieces for holding blades. Now everything is work properly. Another problem - carburetor. Starting good but when I return chock back to normal run engine dropped RPM to 0. check everything what recommend U-Tube, - nothing. Tomorrow arrived new carburetor will see what happen after replacement this part.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sasenko

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware:  This Trimmer Breaks Down Just After Warranty Period Expires
customer_reviews.text: When this trimmer works, it is fantastic. However, my recoil unit/string starter broke. The warranty on this product is for 2 years. I called Ryobi service, and they told me that is a common problem. The big problem is that all moving parts are warrantied for only 90 days. The cost of shipping the broken trimmer to a service center is very expensive. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: DTS@BigIslandRanch

customer_reviews.title: Worst weed trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Worst weed trimmer I’ve ever owned. It has essentially never worked since I’ve owned it for the last year and a half. Wouldn’t start when I first bought it I had to get it replaced because of a bad carburetor. The new one had a bad carburetor. I was so mad that I let them out of time go by where it was not free to get replaced. Ended up paying to get it fixed. Now the motor is dead again and I have no idea why. Avoid the misfortune of buying this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Ryobi all the way
customer_reviews.text: Have not had one issue with this. You just need to learn how to start a gas trimmer guys. Not sure how these people are bending the shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little string trimmer
customer_reviews.text: if you use 50:1 fuel and keep all bolts tight the weedeater will give you good service. it is a fine weedeater especially at the price. I have had mine for 5 years. still going strong. you do have to do the recommended maintenance...go figure.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer! I've had several other brands and none of them compare to this. It starts every time, never had a single issue with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor carb
customer_reviews.text: Very poor carburetor on these. I returned my first one after 3 uses. The second lasted about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Shaft very thin, warps / bends very easily
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the straight shaft bends very easily, so much so that I had to look at photos online to see if it really came straight or slightly curved out of the box. (There are two models, straight and curved.) Also, the weight balance is such that you have to prop it up on something in order to pull the start cord. I have never had that issue before. I have only had my trimmer one season and only used it four times and I can't see it lasting through two seasons of use without at least re-straightening and reinforcing the metal shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Break in half
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of them and this product always seem to crack by the tighten joint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to start. Takes forever to warm up. Does not idle. under powered. Line gets tangled inside and jambs.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Sandgren

product_meta.title: Ryobi RY253SS 25cc Straight Shaft 18" Lawn Grass Weed Trimmer 2 Cycle Gas Power
product_meta.description: This RYOBI 2-cycle gas straight shaft string trimmer features a full crank engine that creates 2X longer life. Accepting RYOBI expand-it universal brand fit attachments, this string trimmer offers versatile operating function, allowing you to save time, space and money. Simply attach an edger, blower or even a tiller to the power head and quickly move from project to project. RYOBI makes string head reloads easier with the reel-easy string head, thread your string, twist the head and resume trimming.
feature_bullets: Durable full crankshaft engine for increased reliability and life
Easily handles outdoor trimming needs for a manicured look
Works with Expand-It attachments, turns trimmer into many tools
Attachment capable: accepts universal brand fit attachments
Straight shaft for extended reach around and under obstacles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars22 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
